text:
Hi <@U7W3LPNUT> :wave:

You've put some much effort in this answer. Thank you for this, I really appreciate it :raised_hands:

This solution is almost what I was looking for but there might be multiple instances of the module in one page, so it may be unclear for the content editors which select/choice is for which displayed data. Do you have an idea how to put this choice/select input (the one inside _[OPTION] Add co-author_) inside a module's input list?

Thanks again for your help :slightly_smiling_face:
